result.execSummary:
All charges against Arlester Desean Hill-Coates in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Arlester Desean Hill-Coates is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Arlester Desean Hill-Coates

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Ruby De Leon in court, defendant Arlester Desean Hill-Coates not in court, in custody.  Tristan J. Bednarek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for jury trial.  State's essential witness failed to appear.  State has no alternative theory of prosecution.  Defense motion to DISMISS is granted by the Court WITHOUT PREJUDICE.
State's Witness List, received and filed.
State's Motions in Limine, received and filed.

Attorney Ruby De Leon in court, defendant Arlester Desean Hill-Coates not in court, in custody.  Katie Bakunowicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Final pre-trial held. Case remains in trial posture. Case remains calendared for a jury trial on 7/18/22 at 8:30 am in Branch 29.
Defendant's Proposed Jury Instructions, received and filed.
Defendant's Motions in Limine, received and filed.

Attorney Ruby De Leon in court, defendant Arlester Desean Hill-Coates not in court, in custody.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
MATTER HEARD OFF THE RECORD.  Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 29. This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Julita Kishma de Leon in court, defendant Arlester Desean Hill-Coates not in court, in custody.  Samuel Tufford appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
MATTER HEARD OFF THE RECORD. Defense counsel was recently appointed and requests a scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with PCM
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  
The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Arlester Desean Hill-Coates in court with attorney Amanda Poznanski.  Defendant Arlester Desean Hill-Coates in custody.  Kimberly Dorice Schoepp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Arlester Desean Hill-Coates appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 28, 2022 at 08:23 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
